name: Space Shooter (Cockatiel)
description:
NOTE: This game was made using the official Unity Space Shooter tutorial. I uploaded this game because my friends wanted to play it. Also volume in options in game doesn't work! ALSO MAKE SURE TO CHOOSE 1240 x 720 IN SCREEN RESOLUTION OR IT WON'T WORK!!! Also, I haven't tried it with mac but I put a download link for it. I don't know how MAC works but I tried....

Dodge asteroid and try to score as high as you can!
